value:
This world possesses technology the
likes of which are still unknown to
Fódlan... An opportunity for study!

My house, Ordelia, is the most
impoverished among the leading
houses of the alliance.$k$pI have taken it upon myself to lift
us out of such a sorry state.

Are you…on patrol? Why not delegate
such trifling matters? It would afford
you more time to strategize...

If you have the time, why not join me
for a study session? There must be
so much I could learn from you!

Mmph?! ...Huh? Me? Sneaking treats?
How completely absurd! What do you
take me for, a CHILD?

I am here to say hello, as requested
by $Nf.

A natural outcome, considering
my efforts.

...I can do better than that.
And I can prove it.
Th-there must be some mistake!

Thank you for thinking of me. I will
be sure to put this to good use.

Lysithea von Ordelia, present!
Is this...this month's assignment?
And where is the professor?

The time I've spent with you on the
battlefield has had an immeasurable
effect on my skill development.$k$pAcademic lectures can only provide
so much. There is no substitute for
the focused pressure of real battle.$k$pSo I suppose I should thank you
for calling me here to this world,
then, $Nu.$k$pI hope to use every mote of strength
I gain here on the battlefield back
in Fódlan, so please...$k$pAllow me to stay here with you
a while longer, as your faithful
comrade and student.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
I won't lose... !
I do not have time to waste!
You will regret this!
You are in my way!
Stay far away from me!
How vexing...
Mm-hmm.
Please, stop slacking off and get to work.
Huh?! Oh! I, um, was NOT indulging in sweets. Really!
...Am I afraid of ghosts? Please! I am no child.
Apologies, but I'm extremely busy, you see...
I must grow stronger quickly...for the sake of my family.
*sigh* If only I had something sweet to eat...
You may count on me. I am quite capable, after all.
I am in.
What should I do?
Let us begin.
